communications.message:
Interfacing... A Nomad, I have erred.

Situation here became chaotic and I had to defend myself blindly. Please accept my apology and spare me. My defences will no longer bother you, if any remain.
Everyone out there's dead aren't they? We tried to stop them but with this shit equipment it was hopeless and had to barricade here.

You are a Nomad.

...

This was not expected. Iridan do not wish conflict with the Nomads. Attack against you was unintentional.

You are here for this source of materials are you not. As a reparation we will relinquish our claim for this particular site.

You will? Amazing.

I will coordinate repairs with your machines and see you inside afterwards.

Finally! ... 

BTG? No. Who the hell are you? Never mind. Just come in since you made it this far and we are fucked anyway.

We are pleased for this settlement.

Situation in this system is extraordinary. I am sure we will find solutions to benefit all parties in the future.

Damn, we sure appreciate you got here when you did. Whoever you are. 

We don't stand a chance against the Scipoi with our equipment and haven't heard anything from BTG.

Victory!

Looks like creator of this simulation did not implement any way to end it. Sorry about that. Anyway, this is the end. Or beginning of eternity if you look it like that.
Finally. I've been told to assist you.

Orbital and surface solar collectors are gone and so is our main power network. Everything still operational runs on emergency power.

Lift down to main DiCe levels is operational and I can give you security access. I expect things down there to be quite chaotic. Because of Scipoi of course but also not all visitors there are, well, very diplomatic and might have seized the opportunity.

Gate to DiCe Negotiations was hit by orbital debris and I lack both resources and machinery to repair it.

choices.description: Provide materials and machines from ship for gate repairs.

communications.message:
Iridan Collective AI core is somewhere down there.

Our troops will help you with surface assault but can't follow you deeper. They've been thrown to fighting from whatever life they had. Please try to keep some of them alive.

You can choose your landing site near Iridan tech laboratories or communications relay. There's bound to some mining activity there too. Iridans use shitload of resources.

Good luck.

Your position is understandable.

We repeat our apology for this minor violation of Ayres Convention. Situation in this system is extraordinary and extraordinary times require non-standard actions.
